page.title: 19"GALA DUST"
page.content: The clatter of boots down memory lane, The mine has gone, it's fields again. What a place to fulfill dreams, Rats, water and their streams. North and Park, Russell and Queen, Colliery streets not now seen. "Mak sharp with the laddel ma, fill the tub Iron me shirt, give me back a scrub Hurry ma, ah dinnit want to be late, Me father's gone, ah cannat wait." "Are yer gannin?" "Ar's on me way To the miners' hall, it's Big Meeting Day." Arl toffed up, he does look cute Ard cloth cap, and pin striped suit The band arrives in good time The banner unfurled, what a "grandun" The time? An age ago The colliery? BRANDON
